data.text: @supertanskiii My Charlie gives great cuddles too! Helps in this sureal time of madness! ❤ https://t.co/xFEoH4LiKT
@supertanskiii @Chumantastic We all need a Charlie to cuddle .
@supertanskiii My Bridie gets me through the bad days https://t.co/48kneGrYLJ

@supertanskiii Misery loves company I suppose, I feel exactly the same at times I don't know which upsets me more, witnessing the incompetence of the government or my feeling of uselessness to do anything meaningful

@supertanskiii Even in the face of this well painted dystopian picture, you still provide the much needed succour and catharsis to soothe the pain #SoothingTweets I feel the sadness. Everything will be fine, in the end. I’m glad Charlie is doing a great job. Stay strong!
@supertanskiii I opened my bedroom door to 2 halves (unfortunately both back ends) of mice.. The first of the new 'season'... Buddy is sleeping off his nocturnal exercises now https://t.co/y8iwlUwVSP
@supertanskiii I was neither pointing out anything missing nor correcting your tweet. I was adding to your own list. Not sure why you sniped at an ally.
@supertanskiii If you gaze into the abyss, the abyss gazes also into you. Kick against the pricks, but don't let it consume you.

@supertanskiii Completely understand where you're coming from.  It was bad enough the Tories were trashing the UK, abusing their own.  We just get worse & worse - & all at once - they attack us from all sides - never any respite.
@supertanskiii Cats are so calming and wonderful for the mood these are my two they are very close called Sam and Dream https://t.co/1vj11HD284
